reason.tex: %text The original assumption was that since $z=x+iy$, therefore $x$ and $y$ $\in \mathbb{R}$. The only possible solution is $x=\sqrt{2}$, $y=-\sqrt{2}$ or $x=-\sqrt{2}$ and $y=\sqrt{2}$. %
